site_name: Chelsea Court, Embankment Gardens, LONDON, SW3 4LS
description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required for the street numbering of Chelsea Court, Embankment Gardens, LONDON, SW3 4LS and the confirmation of the renumbering and description of the internal residential units following their reconfiguration and refurbishment, linked to Planning application PP/17/05695, as follows:

Chelsea Court, Embankment Gardens, LONDON, SW3 4LS to be known as:
Chelsea Court, 24 Embankment Gardens, LONDON, SW3 4LS
